Company Description

Sales Director - TX (willing to relocate)

Employment TypeFull-Time

Overall Compensation -$65,000 to $90,000 per year

Signature Pest is one of Texas fastest growing and locally owned home service provider in Pest Control. Signature Pest is looking to add team members and treat them like family. Sales Directors are someone who has experience and enjoys the door-to-door sales industry. Someone who is motivated to have fun, work hard, and help others. Sales Director are known for their ability sell by D2D themselves, to provide structure, train, manage and generate new business in a courteous, positive, and professional manner.

Why Work Here?

High energy, Hands on selling D2D, Training, Ownership involvement, Company Beach Trips

Sales Director

At a Glance:

As a Sales Director you will sell D2D and canvas neighborhoods, eventually you will recruit, train, and support a sales team. Within an assigned territory you and your team will build business relationships, brand recognition and close prospective clients. You will specialize in report building and question based selling to build a book of business. This position is directed towards leaders who have a back ground in D2D sales, excellent management and motivation skills.

Compensation Package:

OTC $65,000-$90,000

Commissions/bonus opportunity

Profit sharing opportunity

Quarterly All Inclusive Incentive Trips

Relocation Assistance

Who we Seek:

Ambitious, Intelligent, well spoken self starter

Exception work ethic with a drive to succeed

Incredible communication and interpersonal skills

Organized and solution oriented individual

Requirements:

Minimum of 2 years experience in the Door to Door industry

4 year degree or 2 year associates

Physical ability to canvas 50 homes a day performing D2D sales

Reliable transportation

Coachable

Sales motivated

Must be able to relocate to TEXAS

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Email: Steve@kmcsol.com with your resume

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $65,000.00 - $90,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Paid time off
• Professional development assistance
• Relocation assistance

People with a criminal record are encouraged to apply

Application Question(s):
• Do you have reliable transportation?
• Do you live or are you willing to relocate to Texas?

Experience:
• Door to Door sales: 2 years (Required)

Work Location: In person
